title: Pbe account
body:
How do get the PBE account ??? 

Thanks much appreciated

replies.body: You'll be on 300 ping for it. It's not worth it, man.
I have a Pbe account and only get 170 ping and i can't even feel it
You need a lv 30 NA account to start, then you need to wait for it to become available again

Signups for the Public Beta Environment are currently disabled, as the PBE application portal has been taken offline. There have been some long-standing performance issues with the website, so Riot is working to get it back online with a more stable platform.
